(School oam) libaries OOP by Chaiyapat Oam
==========================================

PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/schooloam/

วิธีติดตั้ง
~~~~~~~~~~~

เปิด CMD / Terminal

.. code:: python

    pip install schooloam

วิธีใช้
~~~~~~~

-  Import

.. code:: python

    from schooloam import Student,SpecialStudent,Tesla,Teacher

REF
===
